bill_title: allow a winter load increase of certain motor vehicle weight restrictions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow a winter load increase of certain motor vehicle weight restrictions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The maximum axle and axle group loadings as set for in § 32-22-16 are increased by ten percent between the dates set by the Transportation Commission for each frost zone established by the commission based on a freezing index model each winter. However, this increase does not apply to any bridge or highway that has a posted weight limitation. Section 2. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Transportation Commission shall, by resolution, establish, limit, and modify the duration of the ten percent increase in load limits and the establishment of the frost zones.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
